actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To amend the Carl D. Perkins Vocational Education Act to establish priorities for State distribution of vocational education funds, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Carl D. Perkins Vocational Education Act to establish certain priorities for within-State distribution of vocational education assistance to States. Directs each State that receives assistance under other provisions for vocational education program improvement, innovation, and expansion to consider expending equal amounts on program improvement activities and providing services to special populations.

titles.title: To amend the Carl D. Perkins Vocational Education Act to establish priorities for State distribution of vocational education funds, and for other purposes.
